products.name: Washington Suite Sofa
products.description: A luxurious, comfortable sofa with high-density foam cushions, perfect for any modern living space. Available in multiple colors.

products.name: Dario round table
products.description: A sleek, minimalist white round dining table with a sturdy base, ideal for contemporary spaces. Seats up to 4 people.

products.name: Humphrey 5 Piece Corner Suite
products.description: A stylish 5-piece corner suite with plush cushioning and a durable frame. Perfect for large living areas, offering comfort and elegance.

products.name: Gemona Suite
products.description: The Gemona Suite offers a chic and modern design with soft, durable fabric and deep cushions for ultimate comfort. Ideal for family living spaces.

products.name: Kingsley Suite
products.description: A premium Kingsley Suite designed for luxury and style. Features high-quality upholstery, ergonomic design, and ample seating for a sophisticated look.

products.name: Reilly Suite
products.description: The Reilly Suite combines timeless elegance with practical comfort. Upholstered in a soft fabric, it fits beautifully in any classic or contemporary home.
